actions.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing that a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the Ninety-ninth Congress be printed as a House document.

summary.text: Provides for the printing as a House document of a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the Ninety-ninth Congress, including additional copies for the use of the House.

titles.title: A resolution providing that a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the Ninety-ninth Congress be printed as a House document.
